metadata.name: Rundll32 Execution Without CommandLine Parameters
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious start of rundll32.exe without any parameters as found in CobaltStrike beacon activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\rundll32.exe"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\rundll32'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\microsoft\\edge\\'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious start of rundll32.exe without any parameters as found in CobaltStrike beacon activity

metadata.objective: False positive: Possible but rare References: https://www.cobaltstrike.com/help-opsec, https://twitter.com/ber_m1ng/status/1397948048135778309
